title: SkinsRestorer加载失败
author: 上杉夏相
txt_content:
SkinsRestorer插件加载失败，报错如下
服务端为paper-1.14.4
Could not load 'plugins\[S][皮肤]SkinsRestorer.jar' in folder 'plugins'
org.bukkit.plugin.InvalidDescriptionException: Invalid plugin.yml
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.getPluginDescription(JavaPluginLoader.java:167) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.loadPlugins(SimplePluginManager.java:142) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_14_R1.CraftServer.loadPlugins(CraftServer.java:355) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:226) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:876) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_231]
Caused by: java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
        at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_231]
        at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_231]
        at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_231]
        at java.util.jar.JarFile.<init>(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_231]
        at java.util.jar.JarFile.<init>(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_231]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.getPluginDescription(JavaPluginLoader.java:155) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        ... 5 more

replies.author: 天辉胡萝卜
replies.txt_content: 插件文件损坏，重新下载一份jar覆盖

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 PercyDan 于 2020-7-24 08:50 编辑 

这玩意自动更新有bug，重新去下载
https://c-t.work/s/ba4c47b47fba48

replies.author: 上杉夏相
replies.txt_content:
疾风暗影 发表于 2020-7-24 08:46
插件文件损坏，重新下载一份jar覆盖
灰常感谢
